summary: Results-driven Shipping and Receiving Manager with 5+ years of experience in structural steel, offering expertise in safe work practices, management, and forklift operation. Proven track record of success in managing crews, operating heavy equipment, and ensuring timely receipt of shipments. Seeking a senior-level position that utilizes my skills in Tekla, crew management, and logistics to drive business growth.

bullets: Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments.
Designed and implemented a custom scheduling system that reduced downtime by 30% and improved fleet utilization.
Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium to streamline data collection and reporting workflows.
Implemented secure API authentication protocols to protect sensitive driver and route data.

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
